speaker: Innkeeper Bran
text: Beds are clean, tea is questionable. You staying?

speaker: Player
text: Just passing through.

speaker: Innkeeper Bran
text: Then pass through warm. Wind bites at night.

speaker: Caretaker Iva
text: Mind the chalk lines—they’re a fierce tournament.

speaker: Player
text: What’s the prize?

speaker: Caretaker Iva
text: Bragging. Best currency in the yard.

speaker: Juno
text: Courier on a deadline—talk fast or walk with me.

speaker: Player
text: Any news?

speaker: Juno
text: Packages go missing near the docks. Someone’s skimming. Keep your eyes open.

speaker: Sergeant Leto
text: Papers, please. Ha—kidding. We’re short on papers today.

speaker: Player
text: Anything we should avoid?

speaker: Sergeant Leto
text: Back alley after midnight. Unless you like buying trouble twice.

speaker: Pasha
text: Step right up—today's lots are honest and only mildly cursed!

speaker: Player
text: We're just looking.

speaker: Pasha
text: Looking is free. Advice, too: bids rise when the drones clock off—late evenings are fierce.

speaker: Rana
text: Watch your step. Half these pallets wobble worse than a drunk loader.

speaker: Player
text: Busy day?

speaker: Rana
text: Always. If a crate's tagged in blue, it’s bound for the mine. Don’t touch blue.

speaker: Sedge
text: You look like someone who can mind a secret.

speaker: Player
text: Depends on the secret.

speaker: Sedge
text: Then it depends on the price. Come back when you’ve got something to trade.

speaker: Doctor Sera
text: If you’re bleeding, sit. If you’re not, don’t start.

speaker: Player
text: We’re fine.

speaker: Doctor Sera
text: Good. I’m running low on synth-gel and patience in equal measure.

speaker: Sima
text: Noodles hot, pepper hotter. Want steam or fire?

speaker: Player
text: Surprise me.

speaker: Sima
text: Bold. I like bold. Here—don’t breathe in too deep.

speaker: Tallo
text: New faces? Welcome. Roof leaks, hearts don’t.

speaker: Player
text: Nice place.

speaker: Tallo
text: It’s home. The trick is to keep it ours.

speaker: Ellie
text: Ellie (default): Just swapping out panels here—what's up?

speaker: Ellie
text: The arcade's alive again! Here, a little something for keeping the lights bright.

speaker: Jed
text: Jed (default): Grab a seat if you're sticking around.

speaker: Jed
text: Ollie said you'd stop by. Got a list as long as my arm, but we'll start simple.

speaker: Jed
text: Three busted gadgets scattered around town. Bring them to me, we'll get you on the bench after.

speaker: Jed
text: I'll mark the details in your journal. Go round them up, then we tinker.

speaker: Jed
text: You made it back in one piece. That surge settle down once you pulled the core?

speaker: Jed
text: Then we learn what they wanted. I'll crack the housing and see how far the signal goes. Nice work bringing it home.

speaker: Jed
text: Town runs smoother thanks to you. Keep pace like that and we'll stay ahead of the scrappers.

speaker: Jed
text: Stellarium core is cooling on my workbench thanks to you. We'll make good use of it.

speaker: Jed
text: Smell that ozone? That's the core spool. Hand it over before it cooks through your belt.

speaker: Jed
text: Track that pulse to its source. If the mine lit up, something down there is chewing through power.

speaker: Jed
text: Nice work. That's all of 'em. Now, get this gear back to their owners. They've been pestering me for days.

speaker: Schoolteacher Kasey
text: (Placeholder) Kasey's dialogue here.

speaker: Schoolteacher Kasey
text: Wonderful! The kids will be back under the stars tonight. Please, take this for your trouble.

speaker: Maddie
text: Maddie (default): Beans are roasting—did you need something?

speaker: Maddie
text: You fixed it! Oh, thank you! Take these credits - may your next cup be on me.

speaker: Nova
text: Burrower was feeding on it. Nest is quiet now, but whoever rigged the chamber knew what they were doing.

speaker: Ollie
text: Nova! There you are! C'mon, we're going to be late meeting Jed.

speaker: Ollie
text: Quick, tap my name on your HUD to bring up your options and talk to me.

speaker: Ollie
text: See? Easy. Jed's waiting for us at the town square. You should go talk to him, I'll catch up!

speaker: Ollie
text: Actually, I should probably come with you. Jed can be... a lot to handle.

speaker: Tyson
text: Tyson: Stock's thin but the shelves are honest. Need provisions or just passing through?
